reviewText: This was the best buy so far. I bought a few dvds for Spanish and this set baldness to have it in there so I got it. Every other one was really lacking but this not only tried to drill the words but then helps you create a sentence. (obviously more kid sentences than full on long adult ones). My kids are so much more interested in this than the other ones I tried (that really didn't teach much Spanish). This also seemed a lot longer. Overall great buy!
